channel.title: Irc Channel
channel.description:
How do I connect to the irc channel. I go to it, and I've bean there for about 2 mins now. And got this.
[code] [21:05] Connecting... [21:05] Unable to connect : java.net.ConnectException : Connection timed out: connect [21:06] Not on a channel [21:06] Not connected [21:06] Error : Not connected [21:06] Error : Not connected [21:06] Connecting... [21:07] Unable to connect : java.net.ConnectException : Connection timed out: connect [21:10] Error : Not connected [21:10] Error : Not connected [21:10] Error : Not connected [21:10] Error : Not connected [21:10] Error : Not connected [21:10] Connecting... [21:10] Unable to connect : java.net.ConnectException : Connection timed out: connect [21:11] Error : Not connected [21:11] Error : Not connected [21:11] Error : Not connected [21:11] Error : Not connected [21:11] Error : Not connected [21:11] Error : Not connected [21:11] Error : Not connected [21:11] Error : Not connected [21:11] Error : Not connected [21:11] Error : Not connected [21:11] Error : Not connected [21:11] Error : Not connected [/code]
I don't get it, I press connect and stuff. But.. How do I get on the mopar channel? Or is there a different channel I should go to? I can't seem to find out. All help appreciated.
-Diluted

item.title: Irc Channel
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

[quote=“xxDiluted2xx, post:3, topic:285989”][quote author=Newty link=topic=378245.msg2845500#msg2845500 date=1246241693]
There are some problems going on with the servers, hopefully it clears up in a few days. I think Mopman forgot to pay or some shit, and if today is the 28th (it is) then tlserv is down for matienence according to thuglife.
[/quote]

Okay, thanks for telling me. (: I was getting aggravated because I couldn’t figure it out. ^^ And I always thought MoparIsTheBest owned it? :o[/quote]

I think we have 3 IRC servers, one of which mitb owns.

Read full topic
